SELECT UBCODE, UBRGCODE, UBSELLBUY, UBMID, UBTITLE, UBCONTENTS, UBDATE, UBMAINIMG,UBDETAILIMG, UBSTATE, UBZZIM, UBMSTATE, UBPROFILE, UBNICKNAME
FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, PAGESELECT_VIEW.* FROM PAGESELECT_VIEW WHERE UBMID = #{ubmid}
AND UBCODE != #{ubcode} AND UBSTATE = 1)
WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 6
SELECT COUNT(UBCODE) FROM PAGESELECT_VIEW WHERE UBMID IN (SELECT MID FROM MEMBERS WHERE MNICKNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' )
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GOODS(GDCODE, GDUBCODE, GDNAME, GDPRICE, GDSTATE) VALUES(#{gdcode}, #{gdubcode}, #{gdname}, #{gdprice}, 1)

INSERT INTO USEDBOARDS(UBCODE, UBRGCODE, UBSELLBUY, UBMID, UBTITLE, UBCONTENTS, UBDATE, UBMAINIMG, UBDETAILIMG, UBSTATE) VALUES(#{ubcode}, #{ubrgcode}, #{ubsellbuy}, #{ubmid} , #{ubtitle}, #{ubcontents}, SYSDATE, #{ubmainimg}, #{ubdetailimg}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE USEDBOARDS SET UBSTATE = 2 WHERE UBCODE = #{ubcode}
UPDATE USEDBOARDS SET UBSTATE = #{ubstate}, UBCONTENTS = #{ubcontents}, UBRGCODE = #{ubrgcode}, UBMAINIMG = #{ubmainimg}, UBDETAILIMG = #{ubdetailimg} WHERE UBCODE = #{ubcode}
